basic_binary_oarchive.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_BINARY_OARCHIVE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_BINARY_OARCHIVE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // basic_binary_oarchive.hpp
00011 
00012 // (C) Copyright 2002 Robert Ramey - http://www.rrsd.com . 
00013 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00014 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00015 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016 
00017 //  See http://www.boost.org for updates, documentation, and revision history.
00018 
00019 // archives stored as native binary - this should be the fastest way
00020 // to archive the state of a group of obects.  It makes no attempt to
00021 // convert to any canonical form.
00022 
00023 // IN GENERAL, ARCHIVES CREATED WITH THIS CLASS WILL NOT BE READABLE
00024 // ON PLATFORM APART FROM THE ONE THEY ARE CREATE ON
00025 
00026 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/serialization/pfto.hpp>
00028 
00029 #include <boost/detail/workaround.hpp>
00030 #include <boost/archive/detail/common_oarchive.hpp>
00031 #include <boost/serialization/string.hpp>
00032 #include <boost/serialization/collection_size_type.hpp>
00033 
00034 namespace boost {
00035 namespace archive {
00036 
00046 template<class Archive>
00047 class basic_binary_oarchive : 
00048     public archive::detail::common_oarchive<Archive>
00049 {
00050 protected:
00051 #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, <= 1300)
00052 public:
00053 #elif defined(BOOST_MSVC)
00054     // for some inexplicable reason insertion of "class" generates compile erro
00055     // on msvc 7.1
00056     friend detail::interface_oarchive<Archive>;
00057 #else
00058     friend class detail::interface_oarchive<Archive>;
00059 #endif
00060     // any datatype not specifed below will be handled by base class
00061     typedef detail::common_oarchive<Archive> detail_common_oarchive;
00062     template<class T>
00063     void save_override(const T & t, BOOST_PFTO int version){
00064       this->detail_common_oarchive::save_override(t, static_cast<int>(version));
00065     }
00066 
00067     // binary files don't include the optional information 
00068     void save_override(const class_id_optional_type & /* t */, int){}
00069 
00070     void save_override(const version_type & t, int){
00071         // upto 255 versions
00072         // note:t.t resolves borland ambguity
00073         const unsigned char x = t.t;
00074         * this->This() << x;
00075     }
00076     void save_override(const class_id_type & t, int){
00077         // upto 32K classes
00078         const int_least16_t x = t.t;
00079         * this->This() << x;
00080     }
00081     void save_override(const class_id_reference_type & t, int){
00082         // upto 32K classes
00083         const int_least16_t x = t.t;
00084         * this->This() << x;
00085     }
00086     void save_override(const object_id_type & t, int){
00087         // upto 2G objects
00088         const uint_least32_t x = t.t;
00089         * this->This() << x;
00090     }
00091     void save_override(const object_reference_type & t, int){
00092         // upto 2G objects
00093         uint_least32_t x = t.t;
00094         * this->This() << x;
00095     }
00096     void save_override(const tracking_type & t, int){
00097         const char x = t.t;
00098         * this->This() << x;
00099     }
00100 
00101     // explicitly convert to char * to avoid compile ambiguities
00102     void save_override(const class_name_type & t, int){
00103         const std::string s(t);
00104         * this->This() << s;
00105     }
00106 
00107     void save_override(const serialization::collection_size_type & t, int){
00108     // for backward compatibility, 64 bit integer or variable length integer would be preferred
00109         unsigned int x = t.t;
00110         * this->This() << x;
00111    }
00112 
00113     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00114     init();
00115 
00116     basic_binary_oarchive(unsigned int flags) :
00117         detail::common_oarchive<Archive>(flags)
00118     {}
00119 };
00120 
00121 } // namespace archive
00122 } // namespace boost
00123 
00124 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_BINARY_OARCHIVE_HPP
